.
Action Taken by VA to Notify the Payee of Termination of Payments
Follow the steps in the table below to notify the payee of termination of payments upon authorization by SSA.
Step
Action
1
Notify the payee of the action taken and the reason for the termination by locally-generated letter,
using the letter furnished by SSA as a pattern, and
enclosing the SSA attachments with the letter.
2
Send a copy of the letter to the claimant to the servicing SSA PSC.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section D - Authorization and Notification for the Special Allowance Under 38 U.S.C. 1312(a)
